professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in RAC, ASM, Data Guard, and Golden Gate. Proficient in database design, administration, and performance tuning.

key_responsibilities: Implementing and monitoring Data Guard for high availability and remote disaster recovery.
Configuring and managing ASM and RMAN for backup and recovery solutions.
Designing and implementing database solutions using Oracle.
Assisting in the migration and consolidation of databases.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "RAC and ASM Configuration",
            "Data Guard Implementation",
            "Golden Gate Configuration",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
            "Backup and Recovery Solutions
